scripts.new-version: lerna bootstrap && lerna link && git add . && git commit -m "prepublish" && git push
scripts.release:patch: yarn new-version && lerna exec "yarn publish --access public --patch"
scripts.release:minor: yarn new-version && lerna exec "yarn publish --access public --minor"
scripts.release:major: yarn new-version && lerna exec "yarn publish --access public --major"
